issue.title: [C++] Exit with error if user hits zstd ExternalProject path
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3984](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3984). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should check the CMake version and exit with a more informative error if `ARROW_WITH_ZSTD` is on, but the CMake version is too old
